name: Tsundere Idol (Steam)
description:
The mission of Cherry Kiss Games is to introduce great Japanese visual novels to the world. We have rights to the back catalog of almost 200 titles by well-known Japanese developer Norn/Miel.  For our second project we have translated Tsundere Idol: My Personal M-Pet into English.  A Spanish version is coming soon and if you'd like to see in your language too please let us know!  

We kicked off the Tsundere Idol project with a Kickstarter campaign in February 2018 and successfully surpassed our goal of $10,000 to fund translation.  Thank you so much to all of our backers! Tsundere Idol: My Personal M-Pet is the story of Kota, a mild-mannered student in Japan who is a fan of the up and coming idol sensation Rui Kurumizaka. Wouldn't you know it she happens to attend the same college as him and is in one of his classes! Too shy to approach the cool and popular Rui, Kota is happy just to be in the same classroom as her. Then one day an accident occurs and the contents of Rui's bag spill out on the floor revealing an S&M magazine! Our hero steps up and claims ownership in order to save the true owner the embarrassment of owning up to possessing such salacious literature. And thus begins an unexpected and unusual affair.

Join Kota and Rui as they explore the world of depravity as Master and Pet~

Features including:

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel with all 18+ content implemented
  • Main female character fully voiced with 3.5 hours of original Japanese dialogue
  • Original Japanese artwork modified to 16:9 aspect ratio
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations

For more information about the game please check out our website or follow us on Twitter.

Please note the Steam release does not contain any adult content and it must be installed via a patch that you can download here when you purchase the a Steam Key or for free on our website.
